Name: Set up as Content Delivery
Description: Modifies the Sitecore instance to act as a content delivery instance

Parameters.Name: deploymentPath
Parameters.Label: Deployment Path
Parameters.HelpText:
This variable tells us where the Sitecore website has been deployed. We expect three folder in this path:
Deployment
Unicorn 
Website

Parameters.Name: hostNames
Parameters.Label: Hostnames
Parameters.HelpText:
The Powershell hashtable array of hostnames to replace in the site definitions. 
I.e. @{"localhostname"="site.com"; "othersitelocal"="othersite.com"}

Parameters.Name: targetHostNames
Parameters.Label: Targethostnames
Parameters.HelpText:
The Powershell hashtable array of targetHostNames to replace in the site definitions. 
I.e. @{"localhostname"="site.com"; "othersitelocal"="othersite.com"}
